Cloud Trapeze:1 ?
Unknown Attribute:1
The caster swings himself up and away with incredible speed, landing in a province far away. Although much faster than normal flying, the caster does not really teleport and can have the path blocked by impassable mountains ranges or the Sea of Ice global enchantment.
